title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a Frontend Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for building the 'client-side' of our web applications. You should be able to translate our company and customer needs into functional and appealing interactive applications. you will work with other developers and product managers throughout the software development life cycle. your role will also include implementing visual elements that users see and interact within a web application, which makes your role crucial for the success of our business.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Frontend Developer
Hands-on experience with markup languages
Experience with JavaScript, CSS, and jQuery
Familiarity with browser testing and debugging
Understanding of layout aesthetics
Knowledge of SEO principles
An ability to perform well in a fast-paced environment
Excellent analytical and multitasking skills
BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
responsibilities: Analyze and interpret complex data sets to identify trends and patterns
Develop and implement machine learning algorithms and models
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and solve business problems using data-driven approaches
Design and build data pipelines for data ingestion, processing, and analysis
Perform data cleaning, transformation, and feature engineering
Evaluate and select appropriate machine learning techniques and algorithms
Train and optimize machine learning models using large-scale datasets
Deploy machine learning models into production environments
Monitor and evaluate model performance and make improvements as necessary
Understanding of machine-learning and operations research
Knowledge of R, SQL, and Python
Experience using business intelligence tools (e.g. Tableau)
Excellent analytical and time management skills
Teamwork skills with a problem-solving attitude
BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field

title: Mobile App Developer
description: We are looking for a Mobile App Developer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms. You should have a strong understanding of mobile app development principles and be able to work in a fast-paced environment. Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Mobile App Developer
Proficient in Swift and/or Kotlin
Experience with mobile app frameworks (e.g. React Native, Flutter)
Familiarity with RESTful APIs
Knowledge of mobile UI/UX best practices
Strong problem-solving and debugging skills
BSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
responsibilities: Design and build advanced applications for the iOS and Android platforms
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability
Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We are looking for a UI/UX Designer to join our team. You will be responsible for creating visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces for our software products. You should have a strong understanding of user-centered design principles and be able to collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality designs.
requirements: Proven work experience as a UI/UX Designer
Proficient in design tools like Adobe XD, Sketch, or Figma
Strong portfolio showcasing UI/UX design projects
Knowledge of user-centered design principles
Familiarity with front-end development technologies (e.g. HTML, CSS)
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
BSc degree in Design, Computer Science, or relevant field
responsibilities: Create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs for software products
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement design guidelines
Conduct user research and usability testing to gather feedback
Iterate on designs based on user feedback and business requirements
Ensure consistency and coherence across different product features

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: We are looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and implementing machine learning models and algorithms to solve complex problems. You should have a strong background in machine learning and be able to work with large datasets. Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to develop and deploy machine learning solutions.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Machine Learning Engineer
Strong programming skills in Python and/or R
Experience with machine learning frameworks (e.g. TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Knowledge of data preprocessing and feature engineering techniques
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g. AWS, GCP)
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
BSc or MSc degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or relevant field
responsibilities: Develop and implement machine learning models and algorithms
Preprocess and analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and solve business problems
Deploy machine learning models into production environments
Monitor and evaluate model performance and make improvements as necessary

title: Product Manager
description: We are looking for a Product Manager to join our team. You will be responsible for defining and executing the product roadmap for our streaming platform. You should have a strong understanding of user needs and market trends, and be able to collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative and engaging products.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Product Manager
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Experience with agile development methodologies
Familiarity with data analysis and user research techniques
Passion for entertainment and streaming industry
BSc or MSc degree in Business, Computer Science, or relevant field
responsibilities: Define and prioritize product features based on user needs and business goals
Collaborate with engineering, design, and content teams to deliver high-quality products
Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify trends and opportunities
Gather and analyze user feedback to drive product improvements
Monitor product performance and make data-driven decisions to optimize user experience

title: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: We are looking for a Cybersecurity Analyst to join our team. You will be responsible for monitoring and analyzing security events to detect and respond to potential threats. You should have a strong understanding of cybersecurity principles and be able to work in a fast-paced environment. Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to implement and maintain security measures.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Cybersecurity Analyst
Knowledge of network protocols and security technologies
Experience with security incident response and vulnerability management
Familiarity with SIEM tools and log analysis
Strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
BSc or MSc degree in Cybersecurity, Computer Science, or relevant field
responsibilities: Monitor security events and investigate potential threats
Analyze security logs and alerts to identify security incidents
Respond to security incidents and perform incident handling
Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing
Implement and maintain security controls and policies
Stay up-to-date with the latest cybersecurity trends and technologies

title: Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a Software Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining software applications. You should have a strong understanding of software development principles and be able to work in a collaborative environment. Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Software Engineer
Strong programming skills in one or more languages (e.g. C++, Java, Python)
Experience with software development methodologies (e.g. Agile, Scrum)
Knowledge of software testing and debugging techniques
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g. Git)
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
BSc or MSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain software applications
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement software requirements
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code
Conduct unit testing and debugging to ensure software quality
Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback
Stay up-to-date with the latest software development trends and technologies

title: Data Engineer
description: We are looking for a Data Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing, building, and maintaining data pipelines and infrastructure. You should have a strong understanding of data engineering principles and be able to work with large datasets. Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure data quality and availability.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Data Engineer
Strong programming skills in one or more languages (e.g. Python, SQL)
Experience with big data technologies (e.g. Hadoop, Spark)
Knowledge of data modeling and database design
Familiarity with cloud platforms (e.g. GCP, AWS)
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
BSc or MSc degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or relevant field
responsibilities: Design and build data pipelines and ETL processes
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement data requirements
Ensure data quality and availability for analysis and reporting
Optimize data pipelines for performance and scalability
Implement data security and privacy measures
Stay up-to-date with the latest data engineering trends and technologies

title: QA Engineer
description: We are looking for a QA Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for ensuring the quality of our software products through testing and quality assurance processes. You should have a strong understanding of software testing principles and be able to work in an agile development environment. Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
requirements: Proven work experience as a QA Engineer
Strong knowledge of software testing methodologies and tools
Experience with test automation frameworks (e.g. Selenium, Appium)
Knowledge of software development life cycle and agile methodologies
Familiarity with version control systems (e.g. Git)
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
BSc or MSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
responsibilities: Design and execute test plans and test cases
Perform manual and automated testing to ensure software quality
Identify and report software defects and issues
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to resolve software issues
Participate in code reviews and provide feedback on software quality
Stay up-to-date with the latest software testing trends and technologies

title: Cloud Architect
description: We are looking for a Cloud Architect to join our team. You will be responsible for designing and implementing cloud-based solutions for our customers. You should have a strong understanding of cloud computing principles and be able to work with various cloud platforms. Your role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable and reliable cloud architectures.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Cloud Architect
Strong knowledge of cloud computing platforms (e.g. Azure, AWS, GCP)
Experience with cloud infrastructure and services
Knowledge of cloud security and compliance
Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes)
Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
BSc or MSc degree in Computer Science or relevant field
responsibilities: Design and implement scalable and reliable cloud architectures
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement cloud solutions
Ensure cloud security and compliance
Optimize cloud infrastructure for performance and cost
Provide guidance and support to development teams on cloud best practices
Stay up-to-date with the latest cloud computing trends and technologies

title: Product Designer
description: We are looking for a Product Designer to join our team. You will be responsible for creating innovative and visually appealing designs for our products. You should have a strong understanding of user-centered design principles and be able to collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality designs.
requirements: Proven work experience as a Product Designer
Proficient in design tools like Sketch, Adobe XD, or Figma
Strong portfolio showcasing product design projects
Knowledge of user-centered design principles
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
BSc or MSc degree in Design, Computer Science, or relevant field
responsibilities: Create innovative and visually appealing designs for products
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define and implement design guidelines
Conduct user research and usability testing to gather feedback
Iterate on designs based on user feedback and business requirements
Ensure consistency and coherence across different product features
